Regulation Name(s): Test Qualitative and Quantitative Factor Deficiency
Methodologies: Measurement of prothrombin time prolongation in the presence of human recombinant factor, phospholipids, calcium ions, and activated Protein C
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for HemosIL Protein S Activity assay for the quantitative determination of free Protein S in citrated plasma using ACL TOP Family analyzers.
Indications for Use Summary: Automated coagulation functional assay for the quantitative determination of free Protein S in human citrated plasma as an aid in the diagnosis of hereditary and acquired Protein S deficiency, on ACL TOP Family analyzers.
